isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: ROCKWELL - ASSEMBLY - DRUM AND DRIVE FLANGE

step1.para: Install the drum over the hub pilot. Fasten the drum to the hub with flat head capscrews. Tighten the capscrews to the correct torques. Refer to TORQUE CHART.
Apply a layer of silicone gasket material to the hub mounting surface of the drive flange ONLY. Refer to SILICONE GASKET MATERIAL.
Apply wheel bearing grease (refer to GROUP 10-LUBRICATION) to the inside splines of the drive flange and the splines of the drive shaft.
Install the drive flange on the hub and fasten with washers and capscrews. Tighten the capscrews to the correct torques. Refer to TORQUE CHART.
Install the expansion plug, if used, with a leather mallet.

Install the hub cap, if used, to the drive flange. Apply a 0.125" continuous bead of silicone gasket material around either the mounting surface of the hub cap or the drive flange. Refer to SILICONE GASKET MATERIAL. Tighten the capscrews to the correct torque. Refer to TORQUE CHART.
